statements.stmt: SELECT * FROM visit3.b_ELTEZAMAT WHERE n2 is not null and n2_ok is null and section not in ('maly','law') and t_est_ok is null
SELECT * FROM LAND.C_MA WHERE n3_confirm =1 AND n2_confirm IS NULL and n2_cancel IS NULL and ((ns is not null and wasela=1) or wasela=2) and ff1 is null
SELECT * FROM S_TANZEM.TAMAM WHERE o_type <>3 and Z2 IS NOT NULL AND Z2_OK IS NULL AND Z2_C IS NULL AND Z1 IS NULL AND T_DONE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM visit3.b_ELTEZAMAT WHERE n2_ok is not null and n1_ok is null and n1 is null and t_est_ok is null
SELECT * FROM LAND.C_MA WHERE n2_confirm =1 AND n1_confirm IS NULL and n1_cancel IS NULL and ff1 is null
SELECT * FROM S_TANZEM.TAMAM WHERE o_type <>3 and Z1 IS NOT NULL AND Z1_OK IS NULL AND Z1_C IS NULL AND T_DONE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM land.HAWAFEZ_MODEER where MAGLES = 3 AND MABLAGH > 0
SELECT * FROM visit3.MOZAKERAT WHERE MOZAKERA_SEND1 IS NOT NULL AND  MOZAKERA_SEND2 is null
SELECT * FROM visit3.nile_MOZAKERAT WHERE MOZAKERA_SEND1 IS NOT NULL AND  MOZAKERA_SEND2 is null
SELECT * FROM visit.G_LIST WHERE ENTER_F IS NULL AND CANCEL_F IS NULL AND FARA=1
SELECT * FROM visit.G_LIST WHERE ENTER_F='Y' AND OUT_F is NULL
SELECT * FROM S_TANZEM.TAMAM WHERE T_DONE IS NULL AND o_type<>3 and z_sec0 IS NOT NULL AND Z_SEC IS NULL
SELECT * FROM LAND.SMS_MAC WHERE SMS IS NOT NULL AND SMS_FINISH IS NULL
SELECT * FROM visit3.A_ELTEZAMAT WHERE N1_MAIL_Y =? and MAIL_HIDE =? AND DOC_NO =?
SELECT * FROM visit3.b_ELTEZAMAT WHERE n1_ok is not null and NEED_CONV is not null and conv_ok is null
SELECT * FROM LAND.B_ORDERS WHERE done is null AND SEND_2_BANK IS NOT NULL and ORDER_DATE>'10/12/2021'
